name: Happy Mask
description:
An abstract adventure puzzle world comprised of underlying psychological elements, curious discoveries and platforming perils throughout a puzzling amalgamation of a multitude of nostalgic genres.

Gameplay & Features include:
-Overview exploration
-2D platforming
-Item collecting (Over 350+ items to collect)
-Unlocking Areas (Over 24 areas to explore)
-Unlocking Abilities (Gain abilities to escape threats & traverse New areas)
-Backtracking
-Block puzzles
-Pinball/blocking breaking minigames
-Maze Puzzles
-Switch Puzzles
-Mini-SHMUPS
-Mini Bosses & Boss Fights
-Hidden Secrets

-In game collectable Character Cards exclusive to this game world
-Collectable Paintings that are based on real physical canvas paintings by Trash Vomit Arts
-An original remixed E-book written by the developer
-40 Completely Original Audio Tracks created by the developer
+more

Bonus End Game Content:
-Five differentiated Time Trial Modes based on various sections within the main game.
-Steam Leaderboards are based on the End Game Trial Modes for those players that beat the main game.
+
-Collectable Viewers
-OST Player
-Cheats
-Debug Portals
+more secrets
